refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays the magnitude values of the spectrum.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Displays the magnitude values of the spectrum.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iprd -- the period, in seconds, of each new display.
iwtflg (optional, default=0) -- wait flag. If non-zero, hold each display until released by the user. The default value is 0 (no wait).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Displays the magnitude values of spectrum wsig every iprd seconds (rounded to some integral number of wsig's originating iprd).

informalexample.programlisting: ksum specsum wsig, 1 ; sum the spec bins, and ksmooth if ksum < 2000 kgoto zero ; if sufficient amplitude koct specptrk wsig ; pitch-track the signal kgoto contin zero: koct = 0 ; else output zero contin:
